mapper.select: select a.account_id,a.real_name,a.idcard_no,a.login_name,a.telephone,a.recommender_id, b.idcard_no as recommendIdCardNo,a.status,a.create_date,a.pause_date,a.close_date,a.last_login_time, a.last_login_ip,a.birthdate,a.email,a.occupation,a.gender,a.mailaddress,a.zipcode,a.qq from account a left join account b on a.recommender_id = b.account_id where a.account_id = #{accountId};
mapper.update: update account set status = CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, create_date = CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE NULL END, pause_date = CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ELSE NULL END where account_id = #{accountId};
update account set status = '2', close_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) where account_id = #{accountId};
